title: Code Geass: I Am the Garden of Reminiscence
description:
A one-shot told from C.C.'s point of view after 'Stage.25.' She reminisces about her contractors, past and present. 

Featuring appearances from Lelouch, Renya (Renya of Darkness), Oldrin and Orpheus (Oz the Reflection), as well as Leila and Akito (Akito the Exiled).

related.title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
